```{r}
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidytext)
library(ggplot2)

one <- readRDS("../data/processed/margaux.rds")

one <- one %>%
  mutate(
    date = ymd_hms(date),
    year  = year(date),
    month = month(date),
    day   = day(date),
    time  = format(date, "%H:%M:%S")
  ) %>%
  mutate(sender = "Margaux")

two <- readRDS("../data/processed/hayden.rds")

two <- two %>%
  mutate(
    date = ymd_hms(date),
    year  = year(date),
    month = month(date),
    day   = day(date),
    time  = format(date, "%H:%M:%S")
  ) %>%
  mutate(sender = "Hayden")

combined <- bind_rows(one, two)


```
